name: AngryPuppy
0:
”Alexa, ask Angry Puppy to growl and bark”
”Ask Angry Puppy to bark”
”Ask Angry Puppy to cry”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: angry puppy
des:
Feb 25, 2018 Update: Angry Puppy can cry now and has more sounds and randomized responses for more variety and realism.

Video demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Chth18qOiqI

Have fun playing with Angry Puppy through your Alexa! Your dog will go nuts listening to the Angry Puppy barking, growling, crying, and obeying your commands. You can even bark and growl and Angry Puppy will bark and growl back! Bark at him twice and he'll bark back twice. Growl at him and he'll growl back. After each outburst, he'll wait for your next command until you say stop or be quiet. Try different things and see how he'll respond. 

This skill features Tux, a 9-month old Boston Terrier from NYC. Follow him on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tuxthebostie/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
